Text:
Hey, this may be a bother, but if you would happen to have access to Create Your First Online Store with Drupal Commerce, or even Drupal 7 Creating and Editing Custom Themes, it'd be awesome if you'd put 'em up..
i used to have them and was thinking about uploading them when my hard disk crashed, i've scoured the www's and haven't found it anywhere.. LOL!

This is a great series though! Thanks for this upload, I learned everything i know about Drupal from these videos!
